name: Little Witch's Potion Shop
description:
A protoype visual novel style game featuring an energetic potion making witch named Marron, and her laid back mermaid roommate Lulu. 

Features a very small and short section of gameplay and an art gallery. This game was made for my university final project and the amount of gamplay was made with an exhibition in mind, hence why it is short. It may be expanded upon in the future, but for now it will stay this length.  ^^
